name: Dodging Cubes
description:
Dodging Cubes is a simple game where you must survive squares falling out of the sky!

Please be aware that Dodging Cubes first release is a prototype release, and lacks many features. If you want to suggest a feature to be added in future releases, create a new topic in the community.


Dodging Cubes was made with the Duality 2D Game Engine.

Changelog

v0.1.0 - March 5, 2016

  • Renamed project namespace to DodgingCubes
  • Added a score counter inside the game
  • Decreased the maximum size of the falling squares: from 0.5-4 to 0.5-1
  • Game will now increase difficulty at every second. Cubes will fall slower or faster depending on the difficulty and their size (smaller cubes fall faster)
